QuestData.Title: Banner of the Stonemaul
QuestData.Description: When the dragons came and took over Brogg's old home, Stonemaul ogres fled and left everything behind, including clan's banner.$B$BBrogg knows banner was kept deep in Stonemaul ogre mound, but these days it's called Den of Flame. Brogg must have clan banner to get his revenge on dragons who killed his friends.$B$BBrogg's clan's old mound, Den of Flame, is northwest of Mudsprocket and crawling with dragonkin. Banner will be deep inside the cave. Be careful, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve the Stonemaul Banner from within the Den of Flame.
QuestData.RewardText: You have Brogg's thanks, $n. Brogg has big plans for clan banner.
